ygData.subject: RE: FLOWING BLACK SILK SASH TEST
ygData.msgSnippet: sold for 35000pp on mith marr at last week s auction.  i only need to kill 1500 more sand giants i guess.  as far as ykesha, those sell in the 20k worth of
ygData.messageBody:
sold for 35000pp on mith marr at last week's auction. i only need to kill
1500 more sand giants i guess. as far as ykesha, those sell in the 20k
worth of items/cash on mith marr.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> I thought Radia paid 9000 pp for it, or was it 10000? By the
> way, Radia is
> not a twink, she made all her fortune via
> trading/buying/selling. Last I
> know she wasn't even in a guild. So it is possible for a
> non-guild twinked
> character to get all those nice equipments at that level.
